comment.body: ZeroNet for macOS hasn't been updated for months. Is there anyone that could help update it?

Many issues on the new macOS client.

I'm on macOS 10.15 Catalina.

Icon keeps jumping in dock endlessly and the app never actually launches properly.

A zeronet daemon is spawned though but the only way to shut it down is to kill it from Terminal.

I also see the following error recorded:

```
RSA ECC SSL CAcert generation failed, CAcert or CAkey files not exist. (4516904556:error:0EFFF068:configuration file routines:CRYPTO_internal:variable has no value:/BuildRoot/Library/Caches/com.apple.xbs/Sources/libressl/libressl-47.11.1/libressl-2.8/crypto/conf/conf_def.c:563:line 57)
```
